trans-unit.source: Specifies a print controller that sends information to a printer.
trans-unit.target: Specifica un controller di stampa che invia informazioni a una stampante.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> uses this class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>utilizza questa classe.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>

trans-unit.source: For more information on printing, see the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing> namespace overview.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sulla stampa, vedere il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing>Panoramica dello spazio dei nomi.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Completes the control sequence that determines when and how to print a page of a document.
trans-unit.target: Completa la sequenza di controllo che determina quando e come stampare una pagina di un documento.

trans-unit.source: OnEndPage is called immediately after the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event.
trans-unit.target: OnEndPage viene chiamato immediatamente dopo il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>Genera il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>evento.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>

trans-unit.source: If an exception is thrown inside a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event of a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>, OnEndPage is not called.
trans-unit.target: Se viene generata un'eccezione all'interno di un <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>evento di un <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>, non viene chiamato OnEndPage.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object that is sent to the printer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>Crea il <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>oggetto che viene inviato alla stampante.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics></xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> is called, the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object to a graphic of a single page.
trans-unit.target: Dopo aver <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>viene chiamato, il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPage%2A>metodo imposta la <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>oggetto su un'immagine di una singola pagina.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: The OnEndPage method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object, while the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo OnEndPage Cancella il <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>oggetto, mentre il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A>metodo la deallocazione.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: When OnEndPage is called from a printing context of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog> a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermission> of <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel> is required.
trans-unit.target: Quando OnEndPage viene chiamato da un contesto di stampa di un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog>un <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermission>di <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel>è obbligatorio.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermission> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog>

trans-unit.source: Printing to the default printer requires a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermission> of <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel>.
trans-unit.target: Stampare sulla stampante predefinita richiede un <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermission> <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel>.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermission>

trans-unit.source: All other calls this method requires a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermission> of <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel>
trans-unit.target: Tutte le altre chiamate di questo metodo richiede un <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermission>di <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel></xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermission>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"></xref> that represents the document being printed.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"> </xref> che rappresenta il documento da stampare.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs"></xref> that contains data about how to print a page in the document.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs"> </xref> che contiene dati relativi alla modalità stampare una pagina nel documento.

trans-unit.source: The native Win32 Application Programming Interface (API) could not finish writing to a page.
trans-unit.target: Il nativo Win32 interfaccia API (Application Programming) non è in grado di completare la scrittura in una pagina.

trans-unit.source: Completes the control sequence that determines when and how to print a document.
trans-unit.target: Completa la sequenza di controllo che determina quando e come stampare un documento.

trans-unit.source: OnEndPrint is called immediately after <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.EndPrint> event.
trans-unit.target: OnEndPrint viene chiamato immediatamente dopo <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>Genera il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.EndPrint>evento.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.EndPrint> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>

trans-unit.source: Even if an uncaught exception was thrown during the printing process, OnEndPrint is called.
trans-unit.target: Anche se è stata generata un'eccezione non rilevata durante il processo di stampa, viene chiamato OnEndPrint.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object that is sent to the printer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>Crea il <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>oggetto che viene inviato alla stampante.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics></xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> is called, the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object to a graphic of a single page.
trans-unit.target: Dopo aver <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>viene chiamato, il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPage%2A>metodo imposta la <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>oggetto su un'immagine di una singola pagina.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPage%2A> method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object, while the OnEndPrint method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPage%2A>metodo cancella il <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>dell'oggetto, mentre il metodo OnEndPrint la deallocazione.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"></xref> that represents the document being printed.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"> </xref> che rappresenta il documento da stampare.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs"></xref> that contains data about how to print the document.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs"> </xref> che contiene i dati per la stampa del documento.

trans-unit.source: The native Win32 Application Programming Interface (API) could not complete the print job.
trans-unit.target: Il nativo Win32 interfaccia API (Application Programming) non è in grado di completare il processo di stampa.

trans-unit.source: -or- The native Win32 API could not delete the specified device context (DC).
trans-unit.target: - oppure - l'API Win32 nativa non è stato possibile eliminare il contesto di dispositivo specificato (DC).

trans-unit.source: Begins the control sequence that determines when and how to print a page in a document.
trans-unit.target: Avvia la sequenza di controllo che determina quando e come stampare una pagina in un documento.

trans-unit.source: OnStartPage is called immediately before <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event.
trans-unit.target: OnStartPage viene chiamato immediatamente prima <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>Genera il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>evento.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object used in printing.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>Crea il <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>oggetto utilizzato per la stampa.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics></xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> is called, the OnStartPage method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object to a graphic of a single page.
trans-unit.target: Dopo aver <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>viene chiamato il metodo imposta OnStartPage di <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>oggetto su un'immagine di una singola pagina.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPage%2A> method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object, while the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPage%2A>metodo cancella il <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>oggetto, mentre il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A>metodo la deallocazione.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"></xref> that represents the document being printed.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"> </xref> che rappresenta il documento da stampare.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs"></xref> that contains data about how to print a page in the document.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs"> </xref> che contiene dati relativi alla modalità stampare una pagina nel documento.

trans-unit.source: Initially, the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs.Graphics%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of this parameter will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inizialmente, il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs.Graphics%2A?displayProperty=fullName> proprietà di questo parametro sarà <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value returned from the OnStartPage method will be used to set this property.
trans-unit.target: Il valore restituito dal metodo OnStartPage da utilizzare per impostare questa proprietà.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> object that represents a page from a <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> oggetto che rappresenta una pagina da un <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The native Win32 Application Programming Interface (API) could not prepare the printer driver to accept data.
trans-unit.target: Il nativo Win32 interfaccia API (Application Programming) Impossibile preparare il driver della stampante per accettare i dati.

trans-unit.source: -or- The native Win32 API could not update the specified printer or plotter device context (DC) using the specified information.
trans-unit.target: - oppure - specificato della stampante o plotter contesto di dispositivo (DC) utilizzando le informazioni specificate non è possibile aggiornare l'API Win32 nativa.

trans-unit.source: Begins the control sequence that determines when and how to print a document.
trans-unit.target: Avvia la sequenza di controllo che determina quando e come stampare un documento.

trans-unit.source: OnStartPrint is called immediately after <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.BeginPrint> event.
trans-unit.target: OnStartPrint viene chiamato immediatamente dopo <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>Genera il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.BeginPrint>evento.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.BeginPrint> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>

trans-unit.source: OnStartPrint creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object used in printing.
trans-unit.target: Crea OnStartPrint il <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>oggetto utilizzato per la stampa.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: After OnStartPrint is called, the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object to a graphic of a single page.
trans-unit.target: Dopo la chiamata OnStartPrint, il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPage%2A>metodo imposta la <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>oggetto su un'immagine di una singola pagina.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnStartPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPage%2A> method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object, while the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPage%2A>metodo cancella il <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>oggetto, mentre il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A>metodo la deallocazione.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController.OnEndPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: OnStartPrint verifies that the printer settings are valid.
trans-unit.target: OnStartPrint verifica che le impostazioni della stampante siano valide.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"></xref> that represents the document being printed.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"> </xref> che rappresenta il documento da stampare.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs"></xref> that contains data about how to print the document.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs"> </xref> che contiene i dati per la stampa del documento.

trans-unit.source: The printer settings are not valid.
trans-unit.target: Le impostazioni della stampante non sono valide.

trans-unit.source: The native Win32 Application Programming Interface (API) could not start a print job.
trans-unit.target: Il nativo Win32 interfaccia API (Application Programming) non è stato possibile avviare un processo di stampa.
